message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it at this price?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save some money, but I still want to get a good deal.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your desire to find a good deal. However, given the high value and quality of the item, I am unable to accept the offer at $90. My counteroffer would be $105. This price reflects the excellent value and benefits you will receive from our product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $100. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to accept a price of $102 for the product. This allows us to reach a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think $102 is a bit steep for me. I'll make one more counteroffer, $98, and see if we can meet in the middle again.
